case.title: Indian guy looking for a girl for fun - 30 (Ealing)
case.text:
Hi, I am a 30 year old, cute looking guy who's looking for a like minding girl to hang out with and have fun.
I'm 5ft 7, with a good sense of humour, good manners and have a good job which keeps me busy. I don't have time to meet girls that often, so giving Craigslist a go.
Drop me a message if interested
